mapper.sql: id as id, asn_line_id as asnLineId, sku_id as skuId, sn as sn, create_time as createTime, created_id as createdId, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, modified_id as modifiedId
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_wh_asn_sn SET asn_line_id = #{asnLineId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , sku_id = #{skuId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , sn = #{sn,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , created_id = #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id}
and last_modify_time <= #{lastModifyTime}
